children.subject: OOPS I thought this was for Spring 2022.
Can we also consider this for L&S CS Majors who are stuck taking EECS16B in a remote style env.

history.content:
The faculty have voted that students in the EECS Honors Program may take courses for their major, courses for their breadth area, and 4 units for Honors thesis for P/NP during Spring 2020, Fall 2020, and Spring 2021. 

For questions, please contact Gina Garcia garciagi@berkeley.edu. EECS Honors Program Webpage: https://eecs.berkeley.edu/resources/undergrads/honors

Contact your college with 1/3 PNP limit questions.

  • L&S: https://lsadvising.berkeley.edu/appointments-advice/virtual-front-desk
  • COE: https://engineering.berkeley.edu/students/advising-counseling/ess-advising/
  • COE FAQ: https://engineering.berkeley.edu/students/undergraduate-guide/policies-procedures/faq-covid-19-impacts-on-2020-21-student-policies/
